topComments.author: Full House Frenzy - Northeast Family Adventure
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fripp √© um lugar maravilhoso para se visitar! N√£o gostamos de golfe, mas a ilha tem muito mais a oferecer! As crian√ßas adoraram as piscinas, praia e caminhos! Existem tantas op√ß√µes de aluguel em Fripp. Nossa rota de aluguel preferida √© VRBO.com. H√° uma variedade de propriedades dispon√≠veis! Certifique-se de alugar um im√≥vel que inclui cart√µes de comodidades para que voc√™ possa usar as piscinas. Eu tamb√©m recomendo uma casa que inclui um carrinho de golfe; no entanto, eles est√£o dispon√≠veis para alugar na ilha. Ficamos a semana toda e nunca sa√≠mos da ilha, mas h√° muitos lugares para visitar a uma curta dist√¢ncia de carro, como o centro de Beaufort, Port Royal e a Ilha de Paris. Se voc√™ est√° procurando frutos do mar frescos, eu recomendo fortemente a Gay Fish Seafood Company localizada √† direita, antes da ponte que leva a Harbor Island. Algumas cenas de Forrest Gump foram filmadas aqui e a equipe √© t√£o simp√°tica! Pare no supermercado em Lady‚Äôs Island para abastecer sua geladeira. √â o shopping mais pr√≥ximo de Fripp. H√° um armaz√©m geral na ilha, mas √© caro.  (Original) Fripp is a wonderful place to visit! We aren‚Äôt into golf, but the island has so much more to offer! The kids loved the pools, beach, and paths! There are so many rental options on Fripp. Our preferred rental route is VRBO.com. There are a variety of properties available! Be sure to rent a property that includes amenity cards so you can use the pools. I also highly recommend a home that includes a golf cart; however they are available to rent on the island. We stayed all week and never left the island, but there are many places to visit within driving distance such as downtown Beaufort, Port Royal, and Paris Island. If your looking for fresh seafood I highly recommend the Gay Fish Seafood Company located on the Right, right before the bridge leading to Harbor Island. A few scenes from Forrest Gump were filmed here and the staff is so friendly! Stop at the grocery store on Lady‚Äôs Island to stock your fridge. It is the closest shopping to Fripp. There is a general store on the island but it is expensive.

topComments.author: Joe Ko
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fripp √© uma ilha de barreira privada de 6.546 sq mi, com controle de acesso, localizada ao longo da costa atl√¢ntica da parte Low Country da Carolina do Sul. Fica a aproximadamente 21 milhas a leste de Beaufort, 96 milhas ao sul de Charleston e 65 milhas ao norte de Savannah, Ge√≥rgia. Algumas das ilhas vizinhas incluem Hunting Island (o parque mais popular do estado), Harbour Island, Saint Helena Island, Lady's Island e Pritchard's Island. Uma rodovia de duas pistas cruza Hunting Island (famoso farol) e termina na ponte Fripp Island, onde come√ßa o acesso.  A ilha serve principalmente como um resort de f√©rias residencial (qualquer jogador de golfe e t√™nis? √â tamb√©m a mais mar√≠tima das Ilhas do Mar da Carolina do Sul. H√° tamb√©m muitos, muitos carrinhos de golfe.  Fripp √© conhecida por suas comodidades de resort e reservas naturais, os p√¢ntanos, p√°ssaros aqu√°ticos e p√°ssaros costeiros visitantes, al√©m de jacar√©s e cobras. Os jacar√©s s√£o vizinhos particularmente resistentes e ardilosos. Freddie, um jacar√©, era um dos meus visitantes que sempre se aproximava do lado do p√¢ntano quando eu estava grelhando. (N√£o alimente os jacar√©s. Voc√™ vai se arrepender.) Os cervos tamb√©m s√£o abundantes.  Muito beachcombing, pesca, caminhadas e todos os tipos de recrea√ß√£o. A culin√°ria local abrange desde camar√µes e ostras da costa at√© √≥timos restaurantes em cidades maiores. Parris Island, o centro de treinamento dos fuzileiros navais, fica na estrada. Ocasionalmente voc√™ pode ouvir ou ver jatos da Esta√ß√£o A√©rea da Marinha. Pat Conroy do pai de The Great Santini e Prince of Tides est√° enterrado no cemit√©rio militar em Beaufort. Mar√©s foi filmado aqui. Voc√™ pode ver a casa. Assim como Forrest Gump e The Big Chill - dentro e ao redor de Beaufort.  Beaufort e Port Royal (Hilton Head SC e toda aquela √°rea) s√£o um dos poucos portos do Sul controlados pelo Norte durante a Guerra Civil. The Point, uma bela √°rea perto do centro de Beaufort, compreende centenas de casas ante-bellum preservadas e restauradas que n√£o foram destru√≠das pelo Ex√©rcito da Uni√£o sob Sherman porque o Norte j√° controlava a cidade e alojava seus oficiais e soldados (alguns da Marinha) localmente. Abaixo est√° uma foto dos oficiais da Uni√£o na varanda de uma grande obra-prima de teto azul no Point. A Igreja Episcopal de Santa Helena (a oeste de Point) em Beaufort √© uma das igrejas mais antigas da Costa Leste e o altar foi usado para cirurgias durante a Guerra Civil.  (Original) Fripp is a private, access-controlled 6.546 sq mi barrier island located along the Atlantic coast of the Low Country part of South Carolina. It is approximately 21 miles east of Beaufort, 96 miles south of Charleston, and 65 miles north of Savannah, Georgia. Some of the neighboring islands include Hunting Island (the state's most popular park), Harbor Island, Saint Helena Island, Lady's Island, and Pritchard‚Äôs Island. A two lane highway crosses Hunting Island (famous lighthouse) and ends at the Fripp Island bridge where access begins.  The island mostly serves as a residential vacation resort (golf and tennis anyone? and courtesy/guest cards are required) but several hundred residents make it their permanent home. It is also the most seaward of the South Carolina Sea Islands. There are also many, many golf carts.  Fripp is renowned for its resort amenities and nature preserves, the wetlands, water birds and visiting shore birds, and alligators and snakes. The alligators are particularly resilient and wiley neighbors. Freddie, an alligator, was one of my visitors who always approached from the marsh side when I was grilling. (Do Not Feed the Alligators. You Will Regret It.)  Deer are also abundant.  Lots of beachcombing, fishing, hiking and all sorts of recreation. Local cuisine covers gamut from shrimp and oysters from up the coast to great restaurants in larger towns. Parris Island, the Marine training facility, is just up the road. Occasionally you may hear or see jets from the Navy's Air Station. Pat Conroy of The Great Santini and Prince of Tides dad is buried in the military cemetery in Beaufort. Tides was filmed here. You can see the house. So was Forrest Gump and The Big Chill -- in and around Beaufort.  Beaufort and Port Royal (Hilton Head SC and all that area) are one of the few Southern ports controlled by the North during the Civil War. The Point, a beautiful area near downtown Beaufort, comprises hundreds of ante-bellum homes preserved and restored that were not destroyed by the Union Army under Sherman because the North already controlled the town and billeted their officers and men (some Navy) locally. Shown below is one of the Union officers photo on the porch of a great blue ceiled masterpiece in the Point. St. Helena's Episcopal Church (due West of the Point) in Beaufort is one of the oldest churches on the East Coast and the altar was used for surgeries during the Civil War.
